anticipy 0.0.2

Installation¶

Install into your virtualenv as usual:

pip install anticipy

Don’t have pip ? No problem, just:

easy_install pip==1.2.1

You don’t have virtualenv, Say whaaaaa … ?!?:

pip install virtualenv>=1.9.1

Dependencies will be automaically downloaded and installed

Developers Only¶
